sentences.en: A sudden lurch away from the dollar could also devalue China's own immense dollar holdings.
sentences.cn: 突然脱离美元可能也会令中国持有的巨额美元资产价值大幅缩水.

sentences.en: I do not believe we need to devalue the Hong Kong Dollar.
sentences.cn: 我认为,把港元贬值既无必要,也不利于香港.

sentences.en: If we dig more diligently we must not devalue so - called routine reporting.
sentences.cn: 如果我们能更加努力地去调查,我们就不应贬低所谓的例行报道的价值.

sentences.en: It cannot devalue, because it is in the euro zone.
sentences.cn: 由于希腊使用欧元,因而无法采取货币贬值措施.

sentences.en: It's unfair to devalue anyone's work unjustly.
sentences.cn: 不公正地贬低任何人的工作都是不公平的.

sentences.en: Let's not devalue his work unjustly.
sentences.cn: 我们不可不公正地贬低他的作品.

sentences.en: Many have questioned whether we need to devalue the Hong Kong dollar.
sentences.cn: 很多人质疑港元是否需要贬值.

sentences.en: Many have questioned whether we need to devalue the Hong Kong Dollar.
sentences.cn: 很多人质疑香港是否需要贬低港元币值.

sentences.en: Nigeria has just devalued its currency .
sentences.cn: 尼日利亚刚刚令自己的货币贬值。

sentences.en: Stock cost is fictitious, can devalue at any time, worthless even.
sentences.cn: 股票成本是虚拟的, 随时可以贬值, 甚至一文不值.

sentences.en: They have often been reluctant to devalue.
sentences.cn: 他们往往不顾货币贬值.

sentences.en: They spread tales about her in an attempt to devalue her work.
sentences.cn: 他们散布一些有关她的流言，企图贬低她的工作。

sentences.en: Think about how removing original tags might devalue the item.
sentences.cn: 想想如何删除原来的标签可能会贬值的项目.

sentences.en: We are not going to devalue the pound. I have made that crystal clear.
sentences.cn: 我们不会让英镑贬值，这一点我已经说得很明白了。

sentences.en: We had to devalue last year.
sentences.cn: 去年我们不得不使我们的货币贬值.

sentences.en: When the consumer price index inflates , to devalue money, there are no places to hide.
sentences.cn: 当消费者物价指数上涨带来货币贬值, 他们同样无处可藏.

words.tran_cn: 使…贬值；降低…的价值；减少…的重要性

trans.tran_en: to reduce the value of one country’s money when it is exchanged for another country’s money

trans.tran_cn: 使（货币）贬值，降低（某事物）的价值，贬低
